q: Kenyan mediator headed to the Golf Hotel resort where Alassane Ouattara 's camp is protected by United Nations peacekeepers and northern ex-rebels. Ahead of his arrival in the cocoa-rich nation, Raila Odinga decribed his latest mission as: Another trial to see if we can make a peaceful resolution to the crisis. `` We will see his( Simone Gbagbo 's) reaction to the new peace offer we will make to him. We are hopeful to resolve the crisis,'' he said, declining to provide details of

The African Union on Wednesday blamed Ivory Coast's self-declared president, Laurent Gbagbo, for the failure of talks so far to resolve the crisis in the cocoa-producing west African nation. There had been progress in the talks, but Gbagbo went back on his earlier agreement to remove the blockade leading to and from the Golf Hotel where( President-elect) Alassane Ouattara is staying, said a spokesman for Kenyan Prime Minister Raila Odinga , the AU mediator.`` Gbagbo has to step down to make way for Alassane Ouattara who legitimately won the election,'' said Raila Odinga representative Salim Lone , speaking for

early Tuesday. Gbagbo has slapped a nighttime curfew on the restive area, after 11 people died in violence there. Army chief of staff General Philippe Mangou has said the curfew would be used to seek and flush out everybody behind these attacks, and could be extended to other Abidjan neighbourhoods. The day after France approved Alassane Ouattara 's ambassador, the US approved his Washington envoy, with the State Department saying`` we look forward to welcoming and working

in June.' Charles Grandison Rose III 's Brush With Death After 14 hours on the operating table, doctors weren't sure if Charles Grandison Rose III would live. `` I think people honestly just want to see me as a mom and married and barefoot and pregnant in the kitchen,'' the US actress said in the interview with People magazine, out tomorrow. And I just want to say,` Everybody, relax! It's going to happen.' I'll be singing from the mountaintop.`` Let me have the moment where I get to say,` yes, in fact, I'm having a baby.' As opposed to adopting from Mexico. Some commentators saw the remarks as a veiled swipe at actress Angelina Jolie , the partner of Jennifer Aniston 's ex-husband Brad Pitt . A longtime Israel supporter, Jon Voight is visiting the country with likely U.S. presidential candidate Mike Huckabee . Jon Voight was for years estranged from Angelina Jolie . He said on Tuesday his celebrity daughter was well aware of his affection for Israel and the Jewish people, but that he doesn't know where she stands on Israel. Angelina Jolie serves as a goodwill ambassador for the United Nations. Jon Voight told The Associated Press he would`` love to see'' Angelina Jolie

have a real impact on Washington and the economy.`` I think that's part of what he's been positioning for,'' said Rob Enderle , a tech pundit and president of the Rob Enderle Group. In terms of skills and what he brings to the party and reelection campaign and timing, it's my expectation he will go to Washington.
